sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' function Create() { const [competitionInfo, setCompetition] = useState({ id: "", name: "", detail: "", place: "", price: "", compet_start: "", compet_end: "", start: "", end: "", pay_end: "", }) const handleChange = e => { setCompetition({ ...competitionInfo, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
